definition: flag used as a shop sign/variant of 簾|帘[lian2]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Judge Orie had the curtains drawn while Mladic was taken out of court.
sentences.chinese: 当姆拉迪奇被带出法庭时，法官奥列将帘子拉下。

sentences.english: Introduce:Nylon tyre cord fabric, motorcycles, napkin machine, bearings.
sentences.chinese: 轮胎永帘子布，摩托车，柔巾机，轴承。

sentences.english: She peered at the neighbors from behind the curtain.
sentences.chinese: 她从帘子后面凝视着邻居们。

sentences.english: I have curtained off this part of the room, where the bed is.
sentences.chinese: 我把房间里放床的这一边用帘子隔开了。

sentences.english: The act of forgiveness removes the curtain.
sentences.chinese: 宽恕可以揭去这幅帘子。

sentences.english: Install shades and/or heavy curtains where you can’t avoid windows.
sentences.chinese: 或者在你没法避开窗户的地方装上遮光的帘子或窗帘。

sentences.english: The prospect of tire cord industry was predict…
sentences.chinese: 对帘子布的市场前景进行了预测。

sentences.english: The exported tyre cord fabric wins high reputation in the global market.
sentences.chinese: 公司出口的帘子布在国际市场上享有很高的信誉。

sentences.english: One day the curtain will drop and we may all be dragged down.
sentences.chinese: 总有一天帘子掉下来的时候我们会全被拉倒。

sentences.english: People enter the booth and draw the curtain closed.
sentences.chinese: 人们进入摄影亭，拉上帘子。

sentences.english: It even has a curtain hiding Zooey from his mother.
sentences.chinese: 它里面的帘子甚至将左伊挡住，不让他妈妈看到。

sentences.english: He peered through a chink in the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 他透过帘子之间的缝隙偷看。

sentences.english: The production of PET elastomeric yarns was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 绍了子午胎帘子布用涤纶弹力纬纱的制造技术。

sentences.english: Hiding near the door , i could just see into the kitchen through a small uncurtained window.
sentences.chinese: 我藏在门边，只能从一个没挂帘子的小窗看到厨房。

sentences.english: Remember to ask them to take the curtain down.
sentences.chinese: 明天记着叫他们把帘子拆了。

sentences.english: And then the last thing on the list is the kitchen curtains. They're torn.
sentences.chinese: 清单上的最后一件是厨房用帘子，它们都破了。

definition: cord fabric used in vehicle tires
to push aside (clothing, curtain etc) to reveal something/to toss aside
hanging screen/curtain over shop door (for privacy and serving as advertisement)
flag used as a shop sign/variant of 簾|帘[lian2]
variant of 門閂|门闩[men2 shuan1]
